Package com.orientechnologies.orient.core.security

Interface OSecurityComponent

All Known Subinterfaces:
OAuditingService, OPasswordValidator, OSecurityAuthenticator
All Known Implementing Classes:
ODatabaseUserAuthenticator, ODefaultAuditing, ODefaultPasswordAuthenticator, ODefaultPasswordAuthenticator, ODefaultPasswordValidator, OKerberosAuthenticator, OLDAPImporter, OSecurityAuthenticatorAbstract, OServerConfigAuthenticator, OServerConfigAuthenticator, OSystemUserAuthenticator, OSystemUserAuthenticator
public interface OSecurityComponent
Provides an interface for creating security components.
